title: Pinnacle Studio Ultimate v19.0.1.245 64 Bit + 32bit +Content Pac
description:
Pinnacle Studio Ultimate v19.0.1.10160/245 Multilingual (x86/x64) + Content Pack

Your movies look their best from every angle with the power of Pinnacle Studio 19 Ultimate and its new Multi-Camera Editor. View and edit footage from up to 6 cameras, and align clips automatically with Audio Syncing. Easily lower background sound to keep dialog and narration clear with new Audio Ducking. Take on any editing project with confidence thanks to 64-bit speed, unlimited-track frame-accurate editing in 4K, HD and 3D, and broad format support, including new XAVC decoding, DVCPRO HD decoding, and VFR and MXF support. With 2,000+ effects, transitions and titles, and NewBlue Video Essentials IV, your movies will look stunning wherever you share them online, on devices or on disc.



Powerful video editing
Drag and drop elements to make a movie automatically or use the Storyboard mode to plan. More experienced editors can use the timeline for precision editing.

Multi-Camera Editor
Work with footage from 6 cameras to create more dynamic videos. The Multi-Camera Editor lets you screen your footage, switch angles, cut and delete, add transitions and align clips with Audio Syncing.

Live Screen Capture
Record content from your screen and include the footage in movies with Live Screen Capture. Try Snap Capture View to record Windows apps in action.

Video effects
Choose from over 2,000 2D and 3D effects to surprise and delight your audience. Easily add your most-used effects, filters and transitions to the Favorite section.

High-quality sound and music
Ensure foreground and background sound are always balanced with new Audio Ducking and create custom-fit soundtracks with ScoreFitter. Easily removes unwanted noise from your audio and video files with iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner.

4K Ultra HD Video support
If you're shooting video in 4K Ultra HD, Pinnacle's got you covered with 4K Ultra HD Video support that includes XAVC S support, new XAVC decoding, new DVCPRO HD decoding, enhanced 4K/HD smart encoding and enhanced 4K/HD playback performance.

Video sharing & easy authoring
Post your movies online with easy sharing toYouTube and Vimeo. Easily create DVDs, AVCHD and discs with new Pinnacle MyDVD. Export your movies to popular formats to play them on game consoles and mobile devices.

Pinnacle Studio 19 Ultimate Features

Multi-Camera Editor
Work with footage from 6 cameras to create more dynamic videos. The Multi-Camera Editor lets you screen your footage, switch angles, cut and delete, and add transitions. Align clips automatically with Audio Syncing or use markers, date/time or manual syncing. Even use your multi-camera results to create a Picture-in-Picture effect.

NewBlue Bonus Effects, now with Video Essentials IV
Explore endless creative possibilities with over 800 presets and more than 65 plugins from industry leader NewBlue. This bonus pack includes tools for image stabilization, creative effects, exciting translations and more.

Remove unwanted noise and enhance audio
iZotope Music & Speech Cleaner easily removes unwanted noise from your audio and video files. Experience increased audio clarity and enhanced sound!

XAVCS support for 4K and HD
Work with XAVC S, a new standard for video cameras based on MP4-AVC/H.264, and get support for resolutions up to 4K 3840 x 2160. Includes new XAVC decoding in this release.

4K Ultra HD video support
Produce breathtaking video with support for 4K Ultra HD.

New formats support
Keep pace with the latest formats with new support for DVCPRO HD, MXF import and VFR files.

Pinnacle Studio 19 Plus and Ultimate Features

Audio Ducking
Balance dialog, narration with background sound for pro-quality audio. With Audio Ducking, Pinnacle Studio 19 detects audio or narration and automatically lowers the volume of background sound. Adjust the Ducking Level and Sensitivity if you wish for even more control.

Live Screen Capture
Record directly from your screen, capturing both system audio and microphone sound, then bring your captured files to the main timeline to use them in movies, presentation and training videos. Snap View Capture works in Windows 8/10 to let you record Windows apps in action.

Make movies in stereoscopic 3D


Advanced 3D features

Pinnacle Studio 19 Ultimate also has advanced stereoscopic 3D features, like editing 3D in the timeline just like HD. Our partnership with NVIDIAÂ® allows NVIDIAÂ® 3D VisionÂ® display in both full-screen and window modes. View 3D on dual monitors and export "side-by-side" formats recognized by most 3D HDTVs. Auto-color correct for both eyes and control stereoscopic 3D depth (parallax effect). When you're ready to go 3D, Pinnacle Studio Ultimate has everything you need
